nerd.note.note: Note that in a simulation of the present day, we would expect the net atmospheric response to be about half of the initial CDR flux. There is more outgassing in this illustrative example because this is an idealized simulation from a constant preindustrial baseline, and there is more outgassing when CDR is deployed at lower CO₂ concentrations.

gwp.note.note: See, for example, discussions of the global warming potential (GWP) and alternative metrics.
